foreignData.name: Flüchtende Serow-Gazellen
foreignData.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Bringe zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments eine grüne Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.

foreignData.name: Cabras en estampida
foreignData.text:
Arrolla.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, regresa una criatura verde que controles a la mano de su propietario.

foreignData.name: Ruée de serows
foreignData.text:
Piétinement
Au début de votre entretien, renvoyez une créature verte que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire.

foreignData.name: Carica di Capricorni
foreignData.text:
Travolgere
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, il proprietario riprende in mano una creatura verde che tu controlli.

foreignData.name: 暴走する氈鹿
foreignData.text:
トランプル
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがコントロールする緑のクリーチャー１体をオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ビースト

foreignData.name: Nemorredo Debandado
foreignData.text:
Atropelar
No início de sua manutenção, devolva uma criatura verde que você controla para a mão de seu dono.

foreignData.name: 狂奔的毡鹿
foreignData.text:
践踏
在你的维持开始时，将一个由你操控的绿色生物移回其拥有者手上。

name: Stampeding Serow
originalText:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a green creature you control to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: The ability that returns a creature doesn’t target anything. You can return a creature with shroud or protection from green, for example. You don’t decide which creature to return until the ability resolves. If you control no other green creatures, you must return Stampeding Serow itself.
You choose a creature and return it all during resolution of the triggered ability. This means that if you control two of these, there is no way to end up returning only one creature.

text:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a green creature you control to its owner's hand.
